attributes.action: taxpayers views to be incorporated into goverment spending plans
attributes.additional_details: The Government is to set-up an on-line facility that permits any person paying  income tax to express their preference for the proportion of Government spending allocated to each department. Furthermore, the individual taxpayer preferences are to be summated to provide an overall  indication of the UK income tax payers' preference for Government spending allocations.The overall income tax payer preference is to be published alongside the Government spending plans in the budget.
